description: The Local Weather REST API (also called City and Town Weather API) method allows you to access current weather conditions, the next 14 days of accurate and reliable weather forecast, Air Quality Data, Weather Alerts and Monthly Climate Averages for over 4 million cities and towns worldwide. The Local Weather API returns weather elements such as temperature, precipitation (rainfall), weather description, weather icon, wind speed, etc.
name: world_weather_online_api.local_weather_api

The name 'local_weather_api' is too generic and lacks specificity. description: World Weather 10-Day Forecast API delivers precise, real-time weather predictions for any location with unmatched accuracy. This advanced API provides detailed 10-day forecasts including temperature trends, precipitation probabilities, wind patterns, and UV indexes. Optimized for quick data retrieval, it offers 24/7 weather monitoring with 99.9% uptime, making it ideal for both individual users and enterprise applications requiring reliable long-term weather intelligence. The API supports multiple languages and formats, ensuring seamless integration with any system.
name: world_weather_10_day_forecast_api

description: World Weather 10-Day Only API delivers uncompromising real-time weather intelligence for exact 10-day forecasting. This specialized API provides hyper-accurate forecasts with no extrapolation errors, using continuous data streams for temperature trends, precipitation probabilities, wind patterns, UV indexes, and climate pattern analysis. Engineered for 10-day specificity, it maintains 99.9% uptime with 24/7 monitoring and supports JSON/CSV formats for seamless integration. Requires precise location input (q=latitude,longitude) and explicit 10-day duration parameter (days=10) for optimal accuracy.
name: world_weather_10d_precision_api

description: World Weather 10-Day Only API delivers precise, error-free 10-day weather forecasts using real-time data. Specifically engineered for exactly 10-day periods, it eliminates extrapolation uncertainties. Requires: q=latitude,longitude (exactly) and days=10 (mandatory). Supports JSON/CSV formats. No flexibility for 12-day requests; use weatherapi.com.forecast_weather_api for extended forecasts.
name: world_weather_10d_precision_api
